message: Let's start fair. I take 90% and you get 10% this round. We can work out a better deal for you later.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a good deal considering the inflation working against you.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need a better deal than that.  Let's try 70/30 in my favor.  We're both losing money with each round.
Alice, time is running out and we're both losing money. I'm offering 65/35. This is my final offer.
